about_the_game:
Sherlock, with the trusty Watson by his side, schemes and calculates to ensure victory!
Get them to join you in Unmatched today! This DLC unlocks Sherlock Holmes - a playable character for Unmatched: Digital Edition!

Quick summary:

Starting Health: 16
Attack: Melee
Move value: 2
Sidekick: Dr. Watson

Special Ability: Effects on HOLMES and DR. WATSON cards cannot be canceled by an opponent. (Effects on ANY cards can be canceled.)

Minimum:

  • Processor: Dual Core 1.6 GHz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 650 MB available space

short_description: Sherlock Holmes and his sidekick Dr. Watson have come to the Unmatched! Unlock this DLC to get Sherlock Holmes as a playable character for all your games!
